artist: Artist: Unknown French, 18th century; Artist: After Raymond Lafage
creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: writhing, twisted cluster of male demons and male human figures with one female at L; winged putti at top L; prominent winged demon figure at top R
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

ULC, in pencil and ink: [53-55]; bottom left, in ink: [une partij des ange rebelle]
markings:
Watermarks:
-[J. CUSSON] with a fleur-de-lis, below a crowned [T/J/(or I)], similar to Heawood 3293a [Paris, 1743?], although with a squatter trefoil
-Scrollwork Armorial, with 9? large scrolls
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Fall of the Rebel Angels
